content: additional material stuffing and yarn needle gauge is not critical made with materials called for the toy is about 3 1/2 9 cm tall for a 6 15 cm toy crochet with two strands of yarn and a 6 mm j hook this skunk is the second in a set of four forest friends along with an owl 1 a chipmunk 2 and a porcupine 3 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/forest-friends---owl 2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/forest-friends---chipmunk 3 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/forest-friends---porcupine
